description:
No error message. Typing a number and dialing just does nothing.

Modem: Sierra Wireless, Inc. EM7455

I tried it with an usb modem that uses a prepaid sim card... I have internet access with it and I can send / receive sms through your other app, "Chats". That one works perfectly, except for a small delay of about 1 minute when receiving sms.

This app allows me to receive calls or make calls to any number (including USSD, which skype can't do), I can hang up too, use the dialpad etc but the issue is that I don't hear any sound, nor the other person on the call... I'm not sure why cuz I'm not a developer, but if that could be fixed, it would be insanely cool! I could throw my phone away and only use one device with gnome on it and your 2 amazing apps!

You're AMAZING guys! I love and respect your work a lot!
summary: This actually works, but there's no sound..

description:
It has been working on my Pine phone using Mobian for quite some time.
 Still needs 'trimming' but function is great.!
This is extremely useful on desktop with a 4g / 5g modem, especially cuz it's the only app that allows you to do calls and works with ussd as well.
summary: Amazing! Keep this alive at all costs!

description:
functional
clear layout

...wld like button to clear recent history

came on librem 5, so need to use it a bit more to provide more feedback

on my x86_64/AMD64 laptop I can send/receive calls but no audio comes out of my UAC/UVC enabled modems. Pressing the dial pad does send tones to the receiver's end, but that's all about it (out of the box, no fiddling with kernel whatsoever).
It probably needs a custom kernel to work on AMD64 architectures. I'm using Quectel's EVB with EG-25 via usb. I can send/receive calls, with audio, only with minicom but I'm stuck with the EVB codec for output, without USB UAC passthrough.

Using Pinephone 3G Ram/32GB ver.
Inital install working successfully. After using for some time, it somehow stop working. Remove and Reinstall does not work. Chats and Contacts also stop working at the same time. Idk whether is only just me or it is the same for some.
summary: When it wok, it works! When it do not, it stuck!

description:
0.3.2-r0
PostmarketOS@pinephone
-unable to view/store names from SIM
-app hangs some time when picking up call/or hang up(conversation timer keeps running while call has ended), with that basicaly locking the screen.
- robo voice at beginning of conversation
Aucun moyen de connecter une ligne actif et en plus je recoi toujours de avertissement que l'application a planter meme si je ne l'utilise pas.
хочется звонить и получать уведомления или входящие звонки
суть в том, что приложение нельзя удалить и запустить. удачи
